|**Known Issues**
|Anisotropic filtering and mip map LOD Bias broken with 0.9.0. Works fine with 0.7.9. 

|**Notes**
|DLSSG > XeFG is has lower latency than DLSSG>FSRFG when fps is uncapped.

|**Reported By**
|ID9442
